section.title: Use of articles
section.sectiontitle: Use a/an to introduce something new or unexpected. It indicates that the reader/listener does not know what we are talking about.
section.text1a: I just bumped into an old friend. (This is news)
section.sectiontitle2: Use the to indicate 'common ground'. It may refer the listener/reader to shared experience, or general knowledge and the context will be important to establish exactly which noun is being referred to.
section.text3a: I went to see the house this morning.  (I told you about this house. Shared experience)

section.title: Use of articles
section.sectiontitle: Use no article to refer to something general.
section.text1a: I enjoy talking to taxi drivers. (taxi drivers in general)
